text:
It would be very usefull if ApplyTag and ImportTag could support complete absolute (external) URLs. I.e.:

<xsl:import page="http://someserver/data.xml ... />

and

<xsl:apply xml="http://someserver/data.xml ... />
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org

text:
This feature won't be added.  The XSL taglib will be deprecated soon since
it uses Xalan1 which is deprecated and the XTAGS and Standard taglibs provide
a better alternative.
creator: glenn@apache.org
